content: 69 decrease round ssk k to 2 sts before side m k2tog slm ssk k to 2 sts before beg of round m k2tog 52 sts rounds 70-79 work chart round 80 decrease round ssk k to 2 sts before side m k2tog slm ssk k to 2 sts before beg of round m k2tog 48 sts rounds 81-86 work chart side marker can be removed thumb gusset note the gusset sts between the thumb markers are worked in st st maintain the gansey pattern on each side of the gusset round 87 gusset set up round k1 pm m1l k to one st before end m1r pm k1 50 sts round 88 increase round k to m m1l slm follow chart to next m slm m1r k to beg of round 2 gusset sts increase d 52 sts round 89 work in st st to gusset m1 slm work in pattern to gusset m2 slm work in st st to beg of round the sts between markers are in st st rounds 90-109 repeat last 2 rounds 48 sts for hand and 24 sts for thumb round 110 k to 1st gusset m slm p to 2nd gusset m remove m place gusset sts on scrap yarn then co 2 sts over gap using backward-loop method join to work in round now using the 1st m as beg of round m rounds 111-116 work in patt round 117 switch to smaller needle rounds 118-123 work chart to end bobble in patt thumb with rs facing pick up and knit 4 sts from base of thumb gap to ensure no gaps place held sts on dpns and knit join yarn pm to work in round 28 sts knit 6 rounds switch to smaller needle knit 4 rounds in 1x1 rib bobble in patt finishing weave in ends 2 chart # $ % & needle 2 * # $ $% $& $ $ $ $* $# $ $ % % % % % % % % % % & & $ % & * # $ % & $ needle 1 needle 3 & & & &* gusset m2 & & & # % & * # $ & $ % & * # $ gus g se u t m slip_stitch 1 et e b o r x n f e d g plana g b w t t u r i w k s o d s n n e i s t n i s l v r s t e s t n r s a d t & r e g 8 o 7 ld ms + - /0 12 34 % & * # $ % & * # * * $ % & * 50 glove sts * * * * * * * # # # # # # $ % & * * * * * # # # # # # # $ % & * + - /0 12 34
